definitions: a person who invests in stocks, property, or other ventures in the hope of making a profit

examples.text: financial speculators exploiting small changes in markets to make money
speculators are driving the price of oil higher

shortDefinitions: person who invests in hope of profit

definitions: a person who forms a theory or conjecture about a subject without firm evidence

examples.text: speculators about the nature of the cosmos

shortDefinitions: person who forms theory or conjecture about subject without firm evidence
